mainTask.title: HT-032: Modular Admin Interface System & Intelligent Template Management
mainTask.description:
MODULAR ADMIN INTERFACE TRANSFORMATION: Build upon HT-031's AI-powered foundation to create a revolutionary modular admin interface system that automatically expands with dynamic template-specific settings. This system transforms the agency-toolkit from an app generator into an intelligent platform that grows organically with each template addition.

**Mission:** Create a foundational admin interface that automatically expands with dynamic template-specific settings whenever new page/feature templates are added. Like a smartphone's settings app - core system settings are always present, but when new templates are installed, their settings automatically appear in the same unified interface.

**Scope:** Modular admin interface architecture, intelligent template registration system, dynamic settings management, AI-powered template recommendations, seamless integration with HT-031's AI systems, and comprehensive template marketplace infrastructure.

**Methodology:** BUILD → INTEGRATE → OPTIMIZE → SCALE with 100+ verification checkpoints, comprehensive testing, and surgical integration with existing HT-031 systems without disruption.

**Business Impact:**
- Create revolutionary modular admin experience
- Enable unlimited template extensibility
- Provide intelligent template management and recommendations
- Deliver seamless user experience across all templates
- Implement AI-powered template discovery and optimization
- Create template marketplace infrastructure
- Establish market leadership in modular platform architecture
mainTask.dependency_status: COMPLETED - HT-031 integration successful, all dependencies satisfied

dependencies: HT-031.1.1: AI-Powered App Generation & Template Intelligence
HT-031.1.3: Smart Form Builder & Dynamic Form Generation
HT-031.3.3: Advanced Feature Flag System & Runtime Configuration
HT-031.4.1: Platform Integration & Cohesive System Architecture
Guardian system for safety and monitoring

success_metrics.modular_admin_experience: Revolutionary modular admin interface with automatic template integration
success_metrics.template_extensibility: Unlimited template extensibility with zero admin interface changes
success_metrics.unified_experience: Seamless user experience across all templates and settings
success_metrics.marketplace_infrastructure: Complete template marketplace with discovery and installation
success_metrics.developer_productivity: 400% improvement in template development and integration
success_metrics.user_satisfaction: 95%+ user satisfaction with unified admin experience

critical_checkpoints: Platform integration and cohesive architecture complete

success_criteria.modular_admin_experience: Revolutionary modular admin interface with automatic template integration and unified user experience
success_criteria.template_extensibility: Unlimited template extensibility with zero admin interface changes required
success_criteria.ai_integration: AI-powered template recommendations and intelligent management with 60% improvement in user productivity
success_criteria.marketplace_infrastructure: Complete template marketplace with discovery, installation, and management capabilities
success_criteria.platform_architecture: Market-leading modular platform architecture with seamless HT-031 integration
success_criteria.enterprise_management: Enterprise-grade template management with advanced analytics and performance monitoring
success_criteria.developer_productivity: 400% improvement in template development and integration efficiency
success_criteria.production_readiness: Production-ready platform with comprehensive documentation and deployment pipeline

technical_risks: Complex integration between modular admin interface and HT-031 AI systems may introduce compatibility issues
Template registration and dynamic settings rendering may impact performance at scale
AI-powered recommendations may require significant computational resources
Modular architecture complexity may increase maintenance and debugging difficulty
mitigation_strategies: Comprehensive integration testing with HT-031 systems and gradual feature rollout
Performance optimization with caching strategies and lazy loading for template settings
AI system optimization with efficient algorithms and resource management
Modular architecture with clear separation of concerns and comprehensive documentation
